EngLawName: Act Governing the Conversion of Currency Units Used in Existing Laws and Regulations into New Taiwan Dollars
LawName: 現行法規所定貨幣單位折算新臺幣條例
histories: Full text of three articles enacted and promulgated per 17 July 1992 Presidential Order No. (81)-Hua-Zong-(I)-Yi-3481

articles.content: This Act is specifically enacted to provide for the conversion of currency units used in existing laws and regulations into New Taiwan Dollars, in order to maintain the applicability of the existing laws and regulations.

If the currency unit for a monetary amount specified in an existing law or regulation is Yuan (圓), Silver Yuan (銀元), or Yuan (元), multiply the monetary amount by three to convert the currency unit into New Taiwan Dollars.
This Act shall come into force from the date of promulgation.
